sourceMeaningMnemonic: To the <radical>servant</radical> you say: "<radical>gun</radical>, <radical>ground</radical>, <radical>plate</radical>." It is your job to <kanji>oversee</kanji> everything they do.
meaningInfo: You point to the gun. You point to the ground (that's where the gun goes). You point to the plate (you want it). You have to oversee everything the servant does.
readingMnemonic: Why must you <kanji>oversee</kanji> everything? Because you are Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (<ja>かん</ja>), and Genghis Khan oversees everything.
readingInfo: If anyone had to oversee a lot, it was Genghis Khan, who had one of the largest kingdoms in all of history.
